views.markdown:
Works with iOS 10 and 11+ Configure options from settings!

Getting tired of the old black and dual looking Control Center modules? Wish you could change the color of them?

Now you can! with ColorMyCCModules you can change the color with ease! Any color your heart desires!

- Fixed issues with the included version of CCWallCustomizer 2 where images wouldn't apply. - Fixed issues where the color wouldn't apply after a respring. - Added iPad support for the CCWallCustomizer 2 add-on. - As of version 1.1 users will now have to apply their image again for it to work! - Fixed issues where the CC image would constantly show when an application was launched from the CC.

- Fixed iOS 10 CC issues where when a color was selected it wouldn't be opaque (blur effect)
- added version detection for a cool new feature that allows a user to set a wallpaper for the CC
-Added compatibility for iOS 10 Control Center.
-Fixed the preferences crash that occurs on iPad when the share button was tapped.
-Fix for freezing on certain iOS 11 devices.
-Added compatibility with Haystack
-Updated preferences
